title: Client Is a White Screen & Won't Close
body: My client is just a white screen and will not close I have even tried to restart my mac so that it would close in that manner, but it still will not close. It says "Please close the "League of Legends" client before restarting" please help I need to get this gone I have tried deleting the patcher and Client file in the application folder under league of legends all the way under RADS. I also deleted the game which is weird because I didn't think it would let me delete it while the client was still open, but it did and it's still open I also managed to try to reinstall the game which also still kept the client open just had the launcher right over it, but the launcher was just a white dot which is another problem for another discussion, but right now i just want to get rid of the white screen please help I can't even restart my mac.

replies.body: I'd recommend force restarting your mac by holding down the power button for 10 seconds then powering it back on. If you still experience these issues after doing that, please let me know.
It won't work because new MacBook laptops don't have force shutdown button
